patthana18.24:4.1: Dassanena pahātabbaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.24:5.1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana18.24:5.4: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate cattāri.
patthana18.24:6.1: Dassanena pahātabbaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanadassanena pahātabbo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana18.24:7.1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana18.24:7.4: Hetuyā dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate dve.
patthana18.24:8.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.24:8.3: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana18.24:8.6: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate cattāri.
patthana18.24:9.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanabhāvanāya pahātabbo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana18.24:10.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana18.24:10.4: Hetuyā dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate dve.
patthana18.24:11.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.24:12.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanadassanena pahātabbahetuko nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.24:12.5: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate cha.
patthana18.24:13.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanadassanena pahātabbahetuko nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.24:13.2: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.24:13.4: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
